channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress -- OpenEdge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress -- OpenEdge

item.title: CVE-2024-1403|2024-02-27T15:39:54.850Z -- Progress -- OpenEdge
item.description: In OpenEdge Authentication Gateway and AdminServer prior to 11.7.19, 12.2.14, 12.8.1 on all platforms supported by the OpenEdge product, an authentication bypass vulnerability has been identified. The vulnerability is a bypass to authentication based on a failure to properly handle username and password. Certain unexpected content passed into the credentials can lead to unauthorized access without proper authentication.
